link_desc:
Using the ibm_db driver, zbxdb is able to monitor the various aspects of a IBM db2 database. currently working on v10 on linux. zbxdb runs as a client and can do so from a remote machine. No need to run on the database server at all.

zbxdb maintains one single database connection to do all the monitoring.

More details on https://github.com/ikzelf/zbxdb

Need more items for logging? Propose them (and help with queries to do so)
author: Ronald Rood
